languages.text: "Закройте уши, пойте гимны... И идите вперед. Другого способа нет".
languages.translation_comment:
During Heinrix's second quest (to help Emelina on a dark, corrupted world under attack by Mandrakes).
Argenta: "May the hearts of the faithful not be daunted by the vile speeches of the foes of Humanity, may our faith be strengthened in the face of all corruption and foulness..."

traits.locale_text: "Закройте уши, пойте гимны... И идите вперед. Другого способа нет".

languages.text: "Everyone, cover your ears, keep chanting... and walk. There is no other way."
languages.translation_comment:
During Heinrix's second quest (to help Emelina on a dark, corrupted world under attack by Mandrakes).
Argenta: "May the hearts of the faithful not be daunted by the vile speeches of the foes of Humanity, may our faith be strengthened in the face of all corruption and foulness..."
languages.original_text: "Закройте уши, пойте гимны... И идите вперед. Другого способа нет".

traits.locale_text: "Everyone, cover your ears, keep chanting... and walk. There is no other way."
"Everyone, cover your ears, keep chanting... and walk. There is no other way."
"Everyone, cover your ears, keep chanting... and walk. There is no other way."

"Everyone, cover your ears, keep chanting... and walk. There is no other way."

languages.text: 「全員、耳をふさいで、唱え続けろ…そして歩け。それしか道はない」
languages.original_text: "Everyone, cover your ears, keep chanting... and walk. There is no other way."

traits.locale_text: 「全員、耳をふさいで、唱え続けろ…そして歩け。それしか道はない」

languages.text: "Bedeckt Euch die Ohren, singt weiter ... und geht. Das ist die einzige Option."
languages.original_text: "Everyone, cover your ears, keep chanting... and walk. There is no other way."

traits.locale_text: "Bedeckt Euch die Ohren, singt weiter ... und geht. Das ist die einzige Option."

languages.text: « Que tout le monde se bouche les oreilles et continue à marcher en priant à haute voix. C'est la seule solution. »
languages.original_text: "Everyone, cover your ears, keep chanting... and walk. There is no other way."

traits.locale_text: « Que tout le monde se bouche les oreilles et continue à marcher en priant à haute voix. C'est la seule solution. »

languages.text: «Que todos se tapen los oídos, sigan recitando... y caminando. No existe otra manera».
languages.original_text: "Everyone, cover your ears, keep chanting... and walk. There is no other way."

traits.locale_text: «Que todos se tapen los oídos, sigan recitando... y caminando. No existe otra manera».

languages.text: “所有人，捂住耳朵，继续祈祷……前进，这是唯一的办法。”
languages.original_text: "Everyone, cover your ears, keep chanting... and walk. There is no other way."

traits.locale_text: “所有人，捂住耳朵，继续祈祷……前进，这是唯一的办法。”

languages.text: "Kulaklarınızı kapayın, ilahiye devam edin, yolunuza bakın. Başka çare yok."
languages.original_text: "Everyone, cover your ears, keep chanting... and walk. There is no other way."

traits.locale_text: "Kulaklarınızı kapayın, ilahiye devam edin, yolunuza bakın. Başka çare yok."

languages.original_text: "Everyone, cover your ears, keep chanting... and walk. There is no other way."
